title: Spooky Manor v2.0 [PD]
description:
A long lost relative of yours has recently died and you have been named in the will. To claim your mysterious inheritance you must visit the family home of 

'Spooky Manor' - your inheritance awaits you in the attic of the house...
'Spooky Manor' is a classic point and click adventure game. Explore the manor, find and use objects, solve puzzles and rid the house of its ghostly inhabitants!
'Spooky Manor' is a fun adventure game suitable for all the family.

FEATURES:

+ A classic point & click adventure game, similar to room escape games.
+ Charming hand-illustrated imagery brings the haunted house to life.
+ Atmospheric sound effects and music.
+ An original and unique storyline - solve the mystery to discover the secret of the mansion.
+ Many items to collect and puzzles to solve.
+ Game auto-saves as you progress.

Note: This game is English language.
